General.Name: Damai Sejahtera Abadi Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Damai Sejahtera Abadi Tbk engages in the wholesale and retail trading of electronics in Indonesia. It sells computers and related equipment; telecommunications equipment; audio and video equipment; furniture; household electrical equipment; and lighting equipment and accessories. The company also engages in the repair and maintenance of cars and motorcycles. PT Damai Sejahtera Abadi Tbk was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia.
